alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Hanover, southeastern Pender and east central Brunswick Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Silver Lake, or near Leland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Wrightsville Beach, South Masonboro Island, Figure Eight Island, Hightsville, Wilmington International Airport, Myrtle Grove, Masonboro, University Of North Carolina At Wilmington, Ogden, Mayfaire, Silver Lake, Windemere, Bayshore, Porters Neck, Landfall, Kings Grant, Seagate and Murrayville. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 41 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
